name: Homeless Children Playtime Project
description: The mission of the Homeless Children's Playtime Project is to nurture healthy child development and reduce the effects of trauma among children living in temporary housing programs in Washington, DC.  Playtime seeks to create a city that provides every opportunity for children in families experiencing homelessness to succeed by ensuring consistent opportunities to play and learn, offering support services for families, and advocating for affordable housing and safe shelter.

SDGs.evidenceText: Playtime strives to bring fun and educational experiences to children in shelter with the goal of developing their sense of self-worth, strengthening their mental health, improving their optimism for the future, and ultimately, ending the generational cycle of homelessness
